downloadTitle: Exchange 2013: CHKSGFILES API library and header files for backup and restore applications
downloadDescription: This download includes a 64-bit native-code library and header file that can be used to verify the integrity of Exchange Server 2013 databases that are to be backed up.
detailsSection: Using Volume Shadow Copy Services (VSS), you can create a custom backup and restore application for your Exchange 2013 databases. Exchange 2013 includes a CHKSGFILES.dll that is used to verify the integrity of your Exchange databases. This download includes the CHKSGFILE.lib library and CHKSGFILES.hxx header file for use in your custom application.
systemRequirementsSection:
This download contains native-code files for use with your custom backup and restore application. You will need one of the following products to work with these files:
  • Visual Studio 2010
  • Visual Studio 2012
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download link above and save the CHKSGFILES.zip file to your hard disk.
  2. Open the .zip file on your hard disk and save the files with the Visual Studio project that you are using to create your backup and restore application.
